title: What are the best electric guitars for under $400 for playing metal? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't play metal, more garage band stuff from the 60'sI have a Fender Strat, which I've had for 29 yearsbut my favorite cheap-ass electric is my Epiphone Dot Studio ($225 on CL)a little more expensive, but sweet, is a Gibson SG ($400 on CL)But no matter what anybody recommends, it's personal..you'll know when you pick an axe up, hug her close, and let it rip, plugged in or not.

reproducing my early answer:-Epiphone SG Special Electric Guitar, Ebony (This link is for India)and for ampLine 6 Spider IV 15 15-watt 1x8 Modeling Guitar Amplifier (Link for Amazon India) Am sure these can be found anywhere you want. PS:Research more before checking these out.LES PAUL (Even by Epiphone) are great for Heavy and dark rock.Ibanez RG7421 - BK, 7 Strings Electric Guitar, Right-Handed, Black, without caseThe above one is considered good too.What matters is the amp.Just be sure to search more.Search so that you never regret.I am a blues and rock player so I am not sure of these.
